Name: SVG 0.5.1
Description: This release fixes some rendering issues, particularly related to text elements.

Name: SVG 0.5
Description: The first 'alpha' version of this project with support for many SVG elements.

Name: SVG 0.6
Description:
Ideally this release would bring several new features to the project:

* Remove the SVG element factory and replace with a more pluggable model using the Managed Extensibility Framework. That easily allows new element support to be added. This could also give the ability to create a MathML or ChemML rendering engine ontop of the SVG rendering engine using the basic SVG types.
* ClipPath support.
* RadialGradient support.
* Basic filter effects.

Name: SVG 0.5.2
Description:
This minor release is a grouping of several important changesets that include support for <path> arc segments, stroke dash array support and several bug fixes.

*Update* - Updated the assembly to be version 0.5.2 instead of 1.0.
